医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
索尔克研究人员揭示了艾滋病毒耐药性的分子机制索尔克研究所的研究人员与美国国立卫生研究院合作，发现了人类免疫缺陷病毒 (HIV) 对 Dolutegravir 产生耐药性的分子机制，Dolutegravir 是临床上用于治疗 HIV 的最有效的抗病毒药物之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Salk-researchers-uncover-molecular-mechanisms-of-HIV-drug-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Salk-researchers-uncover-molecular-mechanisms-of-HIV-drug-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f0cbf07-ce0a-4a58-aadb-c2e9446f315b Fri, 21 Jul 2023 21:13:29 -0400 Salk researchers uncover molecular mechanisms of HIV drug resistance
新传感器可用于筛查患者是否患有难以诊断的癌症麻省理工学院领导的团队从自然感觉系统中汲取灵感，设计了一种新型传感器，可以检测自然存在的细胞受体可以识别的相同分子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/New-sensor-may-be-deployed-to-screen-病人-for-hard-to-diagnose-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/New-sensor-may-be-deployed-to-screen-病人-for-hard-to-diagnose-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8fa6424-67cc-42e5-b442-9888d3efcb7a Fri, 21 Jul 2023 21:01:45 -0400 New sensor may be deployed to screen patients for hard-to-diagnose cancers
机器学习可以改变初级保健中的早期癌症检测2023 年 6 月 9 日，Oncoscience（第 10 卷）发表了一篇新的社论论文，题为“转变初级保健中的早期癌症检测：利用机器学习的力量”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Machine-learning-could-transform-early-cancer-detection-in-primary-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Machine-learning-could-transform-early-cancer-detection-in-primary-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8a7e6e0-f3a4-4622-9ddc-58bf060650c6 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 20:55:56 -0400 Machine learning could transform early cancer detection in primary care
父亲的精神疾病与早产风险增加有关西奈山伊坎医学院和卡罗林斯卡医学院的研究人员于 7 月 20 日发表在开放获取期刊 PLOS Medicine 上的一项研究表明，当父亲或母亲患有精神病诊断时，婴儿更有可能早产。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Fathers-mental-illness-linked-to-increased-risk-of-preterm-birth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Fathers-mental-illness-linked-to-increased-risk-of-preterm-birth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcbc4e7b-9c83-41f8-8f28-d6521b2ee1b9 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 20:52:43 -0400 Fathers' mental illness linked to increased risk of preterm birth
细胞外囊泡可能导致硬皮病纤维化根据《关节炎和风湿病学》最近发表的一篇论文，负责细胞间通讯的细胞外囊泡可能是系统性硬化症纤维化的驱动因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Extracellular-vesicles-may-drive-pharmacy-in-scleroderma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Extracellular-vesicles-may-drive-pharmacy-in-scleroderma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef46b074-afc6-4a0a-8fb0-88b4b26627e6 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 15:35:22 -0400 Extracellular vesicles may drive fibrosis in scleroderma
BioIVT 在 AACC 会议上强调其在液体活检研究中不可或缺的作用BioIVT 是药物和诊断开发领域的全球研究合作伙伴和生物样本解决方案提供商，今天宣布将在美国临床化学协会年度科学会议和临床实验室博览会上强调其在液体活检研究中发挥的不可或缺的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/BioIVT-to-highlight-its-integral-role-in-liquid-biopsy-research-at-AACC-conference.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/BioIVT-to-highlight-its-integral-role-in-liquid-biopsy-research-at-AACC-conference.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc32d271-26d8-4964-817c-13dcf597fd66 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 15:23:53 -0400 BioIVT to highlight its integral role in liquid biopsy research at AACC conference
新的 700 万美元拨款支持环境化学物质如何影响肠道微生物组的研究在世界范围内，肥胖和其他炎症性疾病的高发病率与癌症、心血管疾病和 2 型糖尿病的风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/New-247-million-grant-supports-research-on-how-environmental-chemicals-impact-gut-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/New-247-million-grant-supports-research-on-how-environmental-chemicals-impact-gut-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65016b69-4393-49a7-88a5-8c96da61e5ba Fri, 21 Jul 2023 15:07:28 -0400 New $7 million grant supports research on how environmental chemicals impact gut microbiome
宾夕法尼亚州立大学的研究人员获得 NIH 200 万美元资助，用于开发新的生物打印技术宾夕法尼亚州立大学研究人员领导的一个新项目的目标是开发快速有效地大规模生物打印人体组织的技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Penn-state-researchers-receive-242-million-NIH-grant-to-develop-new-bioprinting-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Penn-state-researchers-receive-242-million-NIH-grant-to-develop-new-bioprinting-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab559cd9-ad02-4cf4-b581-fdc1a9cde451 Fri, 21 Jul 2023 15:02:00 -0400 Penn state researchers receive $2 million NIH grant to develop new bioprinting technology
新研究发现母亲和婴儿睡眠模式之间的联系新妈妈们在宝宝出生后的头几年可能会面临睡眠不足的情况。但睡眠过少会对母亲和孩子的健康造成损害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/New-study-finds-link- Between-maternal-and-infant-sleep-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/New-study-finds-link- Between-maternal-and-infant-sleep-patterns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=132cc407-3832-4f9b-ad07-67ba7e840b3e Fri, 21 Jul 2023 15:00:44 -0400 New study finds link between maternal and infant sleep patterns
斯克里普斯研究中心的科学家开发人工智能工具来追踪病毒大流行的详细演变斯克里普斯研究中心的科学家开发了一种机器学习系统——一种人工智能（AI）应用——可以追踪流行病毒的详细进化，并预测具有重要新特性的病毒变种的出现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Scripps-Research-scientists-develop-AI-tool-to-track-the-detailed-evolution-of-viral-pandemics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230721/Scripps-Research-scientists-develop-AI-tool-to-track-the-detailed-evolution-of-viral-pandemics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25f59b32-7f09-43ee-89b3-16fb0c61248b Fri, 21 Jul 2023 14:56:49 -0400 Scripps Research scientists develop AI tool to track the detailed evolution of viral pandemics
